Flying, vigilance, first strike
[i]Battalion[/i] – Whenever Destiny and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain protection from artifacts and enchantments you don't control until end of turn.
[i]Raid[/i] – {1}{W}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if you attacked with a creature this turn.
